import { IonButton, IonButtons, IonCol, IonContent, IonGrid, IonIcon, IonImg, IonLabel, IonPage, IonRouterLink, IonRow, IonTitle, IonToolbar } from '@ionic/react'; import React, { useRef } from 'react'; import '../css/Global.css'; import '../css/ContactInfo.css'; import TopNav from '../components/TopNav'; import Menu from '../components/Menu'; const ContactInfo: React.FC = () => { return ( {/* General Enquiries */} General Enquiries Operating Hours: 8.30am to 5.30pm (Mon-Fri) 8.30am to 12.30pm (Saturday) Tel: 6468 8866 Email: receptions@sim.edu.sg {/* Student Services Enquiries */} Student Services Enquiries Operating Hours: 8.30am to 5.30pm (Mon-Fri) 9.00am to 1.00pm (Saturdays)
Closed on public holidays and SIM / SIMPL shutdown days Tel: 6248 9393 Email: students@sim.edu.sg {/* Programmes Enquiries */} Programmes Enquiries Operating Hours: 8.30am to 5.30pm (Mon-Fri) 9.00am to 1.00pm (Saturdays) Closed on public holidays and SIM shutdown days (Eve of Christmas Day, Eve of New Yearâ€™s Day and Eve of Chinese New Year) Tel: 6248 9746 Email: study@sim.edu.sg ); }; export default ContactInfo;
